                &lt;div class="list_li S_line1 clearfix" mid="4095639405546553" action-type="feed_list_item" &gt;
    &lt;div class="WB_face W_fl"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" href="/5178267382" usercard="id=5178267382"&gt;&lt;img src="http://tva2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.2.1242.1242.50/005ErtTEjw8f9jgjnv10kj30yi0ymtb5.jpg" usercard="id=5178267382" alt="钰钰钰钰儿lqy"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

        &lt;div class="WB_text"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" href="/3309554023" usercard="id=3309554023" node-type="name"&gt;弥补不了_你美好的梦&lt;/a&gt;：&lt;span node-type="text"&gt;哎！&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="WB_func clearfix"&gt;
            &lt;div class="WB_handle W_fr"&gt;
                &lt;ul class="clearfix"&gt;

                                    &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
                &lt;li&gt;&lt;span class="line S_line1"&gt;&lt;a class="S_txt1" title="赞" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4095639262963805&amp;like_src=1" action-type="forward_like" href="javascript:void(0);"&gt;
                                                                                                                                                        &lt;span node-type="like_status"  class=""&gt;&lt;em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2"&gt;ñ&lt;/em&gt;&lt;em&gt;赞&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/span&gt;                &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
                &lt;/ul&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;

    &lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;div class="list_li S_line1 clearfix" mid="4095639144771635" action-type="feed_list_item" &gt;
    &lt;div class="WB_face W_fl"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" href="/1975406324" usercard="id=1975406324"&gt;&lt;img src="http://tva4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.750.750.50/75be4ef4jw8exhtnlwd59j20ku0kumxk.jpg" usercard="id=1975406324" alt="christmas只是在发牢骚"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
